job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: Position: Data Analyst<br>Duration: 4 months<br>Location: New York, NY 10020 (Remote as of now, may go hybrid when office reopens)<br>Pay rate: $60/hr. on w2<br><br><br>Job description:<br>4+ years professional experience and comfort working with large data sets required.<br>Proficiency in Tableau, SQL, Microsoft Excel, and PowerPoint are required.<br>Experience with traditional TV and digital measurement ( Adobe highly preferred).<br>Bachelor's degree or equivalent in marketing, communications, economics, statistics or related field.<br>Attention to detail, accuracy, organization, strong problem-solving skills and exceptional work ethic are essential.<br>Able to communicate complex ideas, stories and datasets graphically as well as verbally.<br>Ability to collaborate and work closely with other parts of the business as well as external partners.<br>Capable of prioritizing multiple projects and ad-hoc requests while thriving in a fast-paced environment.<br>Self-starter, resourceful, flexible, proactive & a true team-player who is willing to pitch in wherever needed.<br>Passion for the entertainment industry and television programming.<br>
